QuestData.Title: Beneath the Mask
QuestData.Description: It's time to end this.$b$bWhen I first hid, I saw a dark shape on the northeast platform. I think that's their leader.$b$bNow that they can't perform any more rituals, we should be able to scare them off.$b$b<Primrose pauses for a moment.>$b$bI... I just wanted to say thank you. I never could have done this without your help. Now, let's drive out this enemy and retake the village!
QuestData.LogDescription: Confront the leader of the possessed fae in Shimmerbough.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Seek out Guardian Morlan at Hibernal Hollow.
QuestData.RewardText: I see. This is terrible news.
